  2. Girl groups
  3. Ever & Lucy

Ever

Lucy

Introduction

Ever & Lucy, also known as EverLucy and Melody (pre-debut), was a South Korean female vocal duo under Shine E&M. They debuted on June 25, 2021 with their first single, "In The Rain".

They are presumed to have disbanded in 2023 due to a lack of activity.
